MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK10 and FK13 postcode areas of Alloa, Clackmannan, Tillicoultry and the surrounding areas. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and for those customer still off supply, we are in the process of repairing a faulty transformer near East Birkhill Cottage. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:37pm on 1st March 2021.
